QuestData.Title: Murkblood Invaders
QuestData.Description: The parchment holds a crudely painted map of Nagrand. There is a big red 'X' where Garadar would be on the map. It would seem that these savages are planning an attack on the city. Take the Murkblood invasion plans to Garrosh in Garadar.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the Murkblood Invasion Plans to Garrosh.
QuestData.RewardText: <Garrosh crumples up the map and throws it into the fire.>$B$BWhat's the use? They've been attacking us for weeks. This is nothing new.$B$BDon't you understand? We're done for... Greatmother Geyah is dying.
